name: Manteca - beyond Mississippi
description:
"Manteca - beyond Mississippi" is the proof of concept of a game for the AmalgamAsh SGB Summer Jam 2021.

Credits :

"Manteca : beyond Mississippi" belongs to the "Mississippi : Blues, Prohibition, Vaudou" RPG Universe, written & designed by Tirodem / Christophe GERARD, owned by Les XII Singes & developped by PVH Éditions

Arts from Mississippi are from Arnaud Hascoët, Alexandre Guillaume, Geoffrey Soudan, Marta Naël, Christophe Bouvet

Star screen pannels "Manteca" & "Beyond Mississippi" are from Jessica Masia and are originated from the book "Tales of the Deep South" (PVH Éditions)

Characters made by Tirodem on Character Creator 3 (portraits & 3D models) with various free & bought (with export licence) assets

Characters animated on Mixamo

Music from Incompetech (just go by his entire collection, it's worth)

Buildings made by  SloshWerks for Daz3D & bought with Interactive Licence

Developped on Smile Game Builder from SmileBoom Co. Ltd.

Arts used on painting (Place d'Armes) :

- Harry Roseland - Reading the Tea Leaves

- Vincent Vna Gogh - Head of a Skeleton with a burning cigarette

- Charles Allan Gilbert - All is Vanity

- Alfred Rethel - Der to als wurger

- Unkown - Beats the Devil

- Jan Frans de Boever - Le Baiseman

- Jan Frans de Boever - The Feast

- Jan Frans de Boever - The Life

- Frances Flora Bond Palmer - Steamboat Race

- William Sidney Mount - The bone player

- William Sidney Mount - The card players

- William Sidney Muont - The power of music
